title: Supreme Court New Guidelines on Cyber Crime
detail: The Supreme Court issued new guidelines regarding handling of cyber fraud and online harassment cases.

title: Amendment in Consumer Protection Act
detail: Government introduced new changes in consumer protection laws to make grievance redressal faster.

title: High Court Judgment on Property Disputes
detail: New ruling clarifies ownership rights in ancestral property disputes.

title: New Family Law Rules Introduced
detail: Updated procedures for divorce and maintenance cases announced by the Law Ministry.

title: Digital Evidence Guidelines Updated
detail: Courts to accept digital evidence more efficiently with new verification norms.
